sys_update_version.payload: standardc.iconlink a label,h2 { display: block; font-size: 2.5rem; font-weight: 300; line-height: 1.1; padding: 0; margin: 0 0 10px 0; } /* TOP ICON ---------- */ a.top_icon { display: block; padding: 20px; text-align: center; } a.top_icon .image-container { display: block; text-align: center; margin-bottom: 10px; } /* CIRCLE ICON ---------- */ a.circle_icon { display: block; padding: 20px 0px 20px 70px; position: relative; } a.circle_icon .image-container { position:absolute; left: 0px; top: 24px; } /* COLOR BOX ---------- */ a.color_box { display: block; position: relative; padding: 20px 20px 20px 82px; border-radius: 4px; margin-bottom: 20px; } a.color_box .image-container { position:absolute; left: 20px; top: 20px; width:42px; text-align: center; } .icon-link-background-primary { background-color: $brand-primary; } .icon-link-background-info { background-color: $brand-info; } .icon-link-background-success { background-color: $brand-success; } .icon-link-background-warning { background-color: $brand-warning; } .icon-link-background-danger { background-color: $brand-danger; } .icon-link-background-default { background-color: $brand-primary; } .text-primary { color: $brand-primary; &:hover { color: darken($brand-primary, 20%); } } .text-info { color: $brand-info; &:hover { color: darken($brand-info, 20%);
